paper_abstract: We deal with the problem of constructing and/or approximating some curves and surfaces from a noisy data set. The main objective here is to adapt the theory of the discrete smoothing variational splines [A. Kouibia, M. Pasadas. Approximation by discrete variational splines, J. Comput. Appl. Math. 116 (2000) 145-156] to the noisy data case. The problem is formulated and a result of almost sure convergence is established. (C) 2008 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Discrete approximation by variational vector splines for noisy data
